title: Steelers-Ravens and Five Coaches on the Hot Seat | The Ringer NFL Show
description:
Ryan Shazier and Cole Wright are joined by The Ringer’s Kaelen Jones to discuss the COVID news surrounding the Pittsburgh Steelers–Baltimore Ravens game (3:40). Then they discuss five head coaches that are on the hot seat (19:40).
Hosts: Ryan Shazier and Cole Wright
Guest: Kaelen Jones
